alert.note: Alert for Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Portage; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca; Waushara; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 6:54PM CST until January 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER STORM CONTINUES THIS EVENING... .Low pressure over southeast Lower Michigan will continue to produce light to moderate snow through about midnight. As the snow tapers off from west to east, the winter weather headlines will likely be cancelled early, except possibly in the Fox Valley and lakeshore areas, where strong winds will persist through much of the night. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Portage, Waushara, Wood, Menominee, Northern Oconto County, Shawano, Southern Marinette County, Southern Oconto County, and Waupaca Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Portage; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca; Waushara; Wood
